jda.tools.tools module¶

jda.tools.tools.calculate_mape(y_true: numpy.array, y_pred: numpy.array)[source]¶

Calculates mean absolute percentage error.

y_true: np.array

The training labels of target value.

y_pred: np.array

The predicted labels of target values.
